title: Jon Vigil from The Ghost Inside
itunes:title: Jon Vigil from The Ghost Inside
description:
Episode #19 - We sit down with Jon Vigil from The Ghost Inside and talk about metalcore, what keeps him going in a band and what his most embarrassing TV show is. We also chat about Active Child, The Rapture, Crosses and Attack the Block.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
